sect1.title: Creating a file system on the new partition
sect1.para: Once the partition is created, we have to create a new file system on that partition. To create an ext2 file system, the mke2fs command is the correct choice. To create a reiser file system, the mkreiserfs command should be used. The new partition is used as the only option to the command and the file system is created.
